libICEpost.src.thermophysicalModels.thermoModels.thermoMixture
==============================================================

.. py:module:: libICEpost.src.thermophysicalModels.thermoModels.thermoMixture

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   @author: F. Ramognino       <federico.ramognino@polimi.it>
   Last update:        29/01/2024

   Classes for thermodynamic modeling of a mixture

   Content of the package
       mixingRules (package)
           Contains detailed packages and classes for computation
           of thermodynamic properties and equation of state of mixtures

       ThermoMixture (module)
           Module defining the ThermoMixture class, which completely
           handles the thermodynamic modeling of a mixture of gasses
           NOTE:
               In future it might be convenient to switch to a package structure,
               in case multiple thermodynamic mixtures are defined (multi-phase?)

-----------
